content: materials our keyhole scarf kit 1 contains everything you ll need to make a solid or striped scarf of your own it contains - 2 skeins of purl soho s cashmere merino bloom 2 75% extra fine merino and 25% cashmere each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 218 yards/ 100 grams solid version - color a 2 skeins approximately 436 yards required striped version - color a 1 skein approximately 218 yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 218 yards required it also contains - us 5 3 75 mm 16-inch circular knitting needles 3 - a stitch marker 4 - a tapestry needle 5 - a printed pattern card you will also need… - a spare needle size us 5 or smaller for 3-needle bind off - stitch holders 6 or scrap yarn pick up a keyhole scarf kit 7 in your favorite color of cashmere merino bloom or choose from 14 pretty striped palettes we knit our samples in these colors solid crocus bud true turquoise hydrangea blossom striped kiln red + red poppy ash blue + wheat flour rosewater pink + warm honey gauge 21 stitches and 31 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished dimensions 15 ¼ inches circumference x 33 inches long designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 8 see more of gianna s designs on her instagram 9 1 https //www purlsoho com/keyhole-scarf-kit html 2 https //www purlsoho com/cashmere-merino-bloom html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-circular_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-stitch_markers html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-tapestry_needles html 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-stitch_holders html 7 https //www purlsoho com/keyhole-scarf-kit html 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 9 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
